entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 37. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 28.
